author: Special Correspondent
text:
Madurai district police have arrested a final-year college student, M. Soundarapandi, on a charge of sexually assaulting a minor girl near Tirumangalam on Saturday.

The police said that the victim, a hearing and speech impaired girl, was on her way to collect fodder for cattle on Friday evening, when the youth forcefully took her to his aunt’s house and sexually assaulted her.

When the girl’s mother came in search of her and raised an alarm, local people gathered outside the house.

The boy, who opened the door, suddenly brandished a knife and threatened the people and escaped from the spot.

Based on a complaint filed by the victim’s mother, Tirumangalam Inspector of Police S. Annaraj registered a case under the Prevention of Children from Sexual Offences Act, and for assault and criminal intimidation.

Soundarapandi was arrested and remanded in judicial custody on Sunday.
title: Student held for sexually assaulting minor girl
